attributes.title: MY LIFE IS AT RISK
attributes.review: Words cannot begin to EXPLAIN just how terrible this app is. Downloaded this to be informed on the president and stuff like that, not expecting anything wrong because this is an app for our president. My phone glitches SO MUCH. I got the worst viruses imaginable. Two minutes after downloading, I started getting anonymous messages and emails by scammers and hackers telling me that I submitted my credit card information, social security number, address, phone number and email into an unprotected website. My information was SOLD on the dark web. At the end of each message and email it either said â€œcurtesy of the Trump administrationâ€ or â€œsincerely, President Donald J. Trumpâ€™s official team.â€ I thought the president was supposed to be helping the country, not selling my information on the internet!! I of course IMMEDIATELY deleted the app after seeing this, but then the death threats came rolling in. They still havenâ€™t stopped. These death threats are very descriptive, explicit and beyond scary. Ever since, I have been living everyday in fear of being killed in my home. Iâ€™ve had to switch all the locks in my house. I havenâ€™t left my home since the middle of June and when I tried to show this to the police, they laughed in my face and told me â€œmaybe if you started working out, you wouldnâ€™t be so fat and can run away faster.â€ First of all, I have asthma so either way I canâ€™t run. Also I am disgusted by being fat shamed by a MORBIDLY OBESE police officer that could cosplay as a giant Santa (as if Santa Claus isnâ€™t big enough)
